summary: This is an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting travel approval for the investigation United States v. Epstein (2018R01618). The travel is for meetings and interviews in West Palm Beach and/or Fort Lauderdale, Florida, related to the investigation of enticement of minors for sexual activity.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The author of the email requesting travel approval for the Epstein investigation. They are planning to travel to Florida for meetings and interviews.

events.title: Travel Approval Request for Epstein Investigation
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney requests permission to travel to Florida for meetings and interviews related to the United States v. Epstein investigation.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: The document is a travel approval request dated March 14, 2019, from a federal prosecutor.
The travel is for the investigation 'United States v. Epstein, 2018R01618', concerning enticement of minors for sexual activity.
The planned travel was for two days of meetings and interviews in West Palm Beach and/or Fort Lauderdale, Florida.
The request indicates active investigative work on the Epstein case was ongoing in early 2019.
